SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
CLI
Class implementing the GameInput interface to provide a default terminal-based support for a GameController object.
ConsoleView
Class providing a basic text view of a Game object.
Difficulty
Enumeration type which helps to represent different levels of difficulty to be used in game implementations.
EventType
Enumeration type which helps to represent different type of events that could occur during the life of the game.
FileManager
Class which adds saving and loading mechanics for a Game instance.
Game
Class which holds the common logic for all games built uppon the gridgames package.
GameController
Class which handles modifications of a Game instance.
GameEvent
Class representing an event in the game.
GameInput
Interface for classes which gather user's input for the GameController class.
GameListener
Interface that a class must implement to be able to be a listener of a Game object.
GameState
Enumeration type which helps to keep track of the state of the current game.
GraphicalView
Class providing a graphical user interface for a Game object.
Grid
Class representing the container for Tile objects.
Main
A small class to try the gridgames package.
MouseInput
Class implementing the GameInput interface to provide mouse support for a GameController object.
SameGame
Class which holds the logic related to the SameGame.
SoundPlayer
Class which enables sound notifications for the user, as he plays the game.
SwingIntegrated
Tagging interface for classes implementing the GameInput interface, but which are related to events supported by the Swing framework.
Tile
Class which describes the element the user can interact with to play the game.
